Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2008 06:56AM ottawagirl wrote: Newbie, ooo nipples!  I can't wait for that.  How long after your surgery did you have to wait before you could do them?? Gymrat, I have to have the lat flap because I had a tummy tuck 12 years ago.   I'm having with an implant because I am about a D cup and my PS said I will get a more natural look with both.  My main concern was to get this done and start to get my life back. This is the first step in that process.  All of this implant stuff is weird for me because they found my cancer after a routine biopsy after a breastr reduction in January.  There's irony for you - I now need an implant. You have to listen to your gut and be at peace with whatever decision you make.  Everyone is different and every case of cancer is different.  What works for some does not work for all.  I hope that helps and all the best.  Michelle

Posts.Content: Apr 1, 2008 06:32AM ottawagirl wrote: Dottie, looks we're surgery buddies! I know what you mean about the range of emotions.  So far, I've been pretty stable.  A tad more weepy than normal but only one crying fit (really it was a good old fashioned temper tantrum).  Well last night as I was brushing my teeth before bed, I statred crying and couldn't stop.  I literally cried myself to sleep. I'm 40 years old and don't remember ever doing that.  I felt total panic. I'm hoping this will get better as I get closer.  I've planned a spa day for Friday - I'm sure that will help.
Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine

Posts.Content: Apr 3, 2008 11:03AM ottawagirl wrote: Smithlme - Great tattoo!  I'll be getting something when this is all done.  Still working on the design.  Second mastectomy - was it planned this way??
Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine

Posts.Content: Mar 6, 2008 10:29AM ottawagirl wrote: Hi Viv, I'll be thinking of you on the 18th.  I almost joined your bye-bye boobie gang as my surgery was originally scheduled for March 19th. April feels a long way off. I'll have to back for the nipple and aereola tatooing and I might need a little lipo on the side of my back where they aren't taking any tissue. My husband and I have a trip to the Dominican Republic booked for May 18th.  I just hope I'll be healed enough by then.  I'm going on the assumption that I will be - staying positive!! The Ottawa gang has not gotten together yet, but I'm still hoping we can arrange something.  Stay strong - you're in my thoughts. Michelle
Posts.Title: Build-A-Boob in April - anyone else? ottawagirl crazydaisy

Posts.Content: ottawagirl wrote: O.K., so after having 6 diifferent men poke and grope my boobs (none of which are my husband), I've decided to go ahead with a lb mastectomy with immediate (build-a-boob) reconstruction.  An implant with tissue/muscle from my back (not enough tummy - woo-hoo!). I'm schedule for April 7th.  Anyone else?? Michelle Dx 1/29/2008, DCIS, 1cm, Stage 0, Grade 2, 0/0 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
